question:
In light of the recent inauguration of India’s first e-waste clinic by the Central Pollution Control Board, consider the following statements:
  1. The facility was set up in Madhya Pradesh.
  2. It has provision to collect electronic waste from door-to-door.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Central Pollution Control Board has set up India’s first e-waste clinic in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh. It was set up in collaboration with Bhopal Municipal Corporation to safely process and dispose electronic wastes on a pilot basis. The success of the 3 month long project will determine its emulation elsewhere in the country. Statement 2 is correct: The Bhopal e-waste clinic project has facility to collect the electronic waste both from door to door and direct deposition at the facility. The technical support for the project is to be provided by the CPCB. The clinic was prepared in junk low floor bus- decorated with electronic wastes and also has a TV installed to showcase documentaries.
